scripts.test: pnpm test:react && pnpm test:svelte && pnpm test:vue
scripts.test:react:dev: pnpx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd" "PACKAGE=react node tests/app/server.js" "cd packages/react/test-app && npm run dev" --names=server,vite
scripts.test:svelte:dev: pnpx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd" "PACKAGE=svelte node tests/app/server.js" "cd packages/svelte/test-app && npm run dev" --names=server,vite
scripts.test:vue:dev: pnpx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd" "PACKAGE=vue3 node tests/app/server.js" "cd packages/vue3/test-app && npm run dev" --names=server,vite
